query:
ALTER TABLE contacts 
  ADD COLUMN firstName VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN lastName VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN middleInitial VARCHAR(10) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN generationalSuffix VARCHAR(20) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN gender VARCHAR(20) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN maritalStatus VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN netAssetValue VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN homeBusiness VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN educationModel VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN occupationGroup VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN occupationCode VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN businessOwner VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN notes TEXT NULL,
  ADD COLUMN dealMachineContactId VARCHAR(50) NULL;

ALTER TABLE contactPhones
  ADD COLUMN usage2Months VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN usage12Months VARCHAR(50) NULL;
